channel.title: A Hugo website
channel.description: Recent content on A Hugo website

item.title: Air crash data analysis
item.description: Since the Wright brothers invented airplanes in 1903, the history of human flight has gone through more than one hundred years. Looking back on history, airplanes have occupied an important position in transportation because of their increasingly convenient and irreplaceable advantages. Worldwide, the number of global aircraft passenger traffic has increased in the past decade. .

item.title: About
item.description: This is a “hello world” example website for the blogdown package. The theme was forked from @jrutheiser/hugo-lithium-theme and modified by Yihui Xie.
